tasks.title: Bootstrap PRD tracking artifacts
tasks.description: Create PRD.json and progress.txt to enforce Ralph methodology tracking.
tasks.validation: PRD.json and progress.txt exist in repo root.

tasks.title: Stabilize CIP WebAPI gateway and tag mirroring
tasks.description: Ensure CIP gateway serves /tags reliably and mirrors DO/DI, AO/AI, timer, counters, and reset behavior against cpppo server.
tasks.validation: CIP /tags returns tag list; FUXA CIP view updates; reset and counters behave as specified.

tasks.title: Diagnostics: capture gateway traffic for CIP
tasks.description: Update diagnostics capture logic so CIP captures include WebAPI gateway traffic on port 9000 alongside CIP port 44818.
tasks.validation: Capture menu produces pcap containing CIP and WebAPI traffic when gateway is active.

tasks.title: Implement MQTT protocol lab with direct FUXA connection
tasks.description: Set up MQTT broker/device bridge and FUXA MQTT client tags for canonical IO with timer/counter/reset logic.
tasks.validation: FUXA MQTT view updates and mirrors IO; diagnostics can capture MQTT traffic.

tasks.title: Fix MQTT connection status and IO updates in FUXA
tasks.description: Ensure FUXA MQTT device connects cleanly and the MQTT bridge publishes expected IO for the Test Bench.
tasks.validation: MQTT connection status is green and DO/AO changes update DI/AI/TMR/CNT on MQTT Test Bench.

tasks.title: Remove duplicate CIP Test Bench view
tasks.description: Delete extra CIP Test Bench view so only one CIP view remains in FUXA.
tasks.validation: FUXA Views list shows a single CIP Test Bench entry.

tasks.title: Harden labctl when no proto-server containers exist
tasks.description: Prevent labctl from failing when no proto-server containers are running.
tasks.validation: labctl switch works cleanly with zero proto-server containers.

tasks.title: Implement DNP3 WebAPI gateway (CIP-style)
tasks.description: Expose DNP3 points via a WebAPI gateway so FUXA uses WebAPI instead of the native DNP3 driver.
tasks.validation: Gateway /tags returns canonical IO and FUXA DNP3 view updates via WebAPI connection.

tasks.title: Fix DNP3 gateway build dependencies
tasks.description: Ensure the DNP3 WebAPI gateway image builds successfully by making pydnp3 optional with a build arg.
tasks.validation: Default docker build for protocols/dnp3/gateway succeeds without pydnp3; optional pydnp3 build can be enabled via WITH_PYDNP3=1.

tasks.title: Keep DNP3 gateway logic self-contained (defer outstation)
tasks.description: Revert DNP3 to a WebAPI gateway that simulates IO internally, deferring the outstation-backed implementation to a later task.
tasks.validation: FUXA DNP3 view updates via the WebAPI gateway with DO/DI mirror, AO/AI mirror, timer, counters, and reset.

tasks.title: Implement IEC-104 WebAPI gateway lab
tasks.description: Expose IEC-104 points via a WebAPI gateway with internal IO logic so FUXA can bind using WebAPI. Include the IEC-104 server container for packet capture and future full-stack testing.
tasks.validation: FUXA IEC-104 view updates via WebAPI gateway with DO/DI mirror, AO/AI mirror, timer, counters, and reset; diagnostics can capture IEC-104 traffic when server is enabled.

tasks.title: Normalize FUXA Test Bench styling and AI bar naming
tasks.description: Update all Test Bench views so led_1..led_4, output_1..output_3, and shape_24 use stroke/text color #1f8ed3ff, and rename the AI bar currently named reset.
tasks.validation: All Test Bench views show updated colors for specified items and the AI bar is renamed from reset to ai_bar.

tasks.title: Guest-only Modbus access with locked FUXA views
tasks.description: Expose a guest-only FUXA instance containing only the Modbus Test Bench, routed by Nginx so guests cannot access editor/lab or switch views. Admin access remains unchanged.
tasks.validation: Guest URL shows only Modbus Test Bench with no view switching; /editor and /lab are blocked for guest; admin still sees all protocol views.

tasks.title: Remove advanced CLI access from diagnostics menu
tasks.description: Remove the advanced shell option from the diagnostics menu and keep ttyd limited to the capture workflow.
tasks.validation: Diagnostics menu has no advanced shell option and users cannot access a shell from ttyd.

tasks.title: Document HTTPS/TLS hardening guidance
tasks.description: Document where TLS termination should live (nginx or external proxy) and recommended HTTPS deployment for guest/admin/diagnostics endpoints.
tasks.validation: README or docs section explains HTTPS/TLS setup with clear deployment guidance.

tasks.title: Deployment readiness analysis and scaling guidance
tasks.description: Produce a deployment readiness report covering VM sizing, multi-user behavior, lab switchover flow, and backend orchestration expectations for the frontend integration.
tasks.validation: docs/deployment_evaluation.md exists with recommendations and integration steps.

tasks.title: Prototype lab switchover UI and control endpoints
tasks.description: Create a simple HTML page to test lab switching and a minimal control script to start/stop protocol containers and toggle FUXA connections.
tasks.validation: HTML page loads and triggers lab switches on the host; control script updates active protocol and enables/disables FUXA connections.

tasks.title: Rename admin account to proto-researcher
tasks.description: Rename the admin account to proto-researcher across gateway auth, diagnostics ttyd login, and documentation.
tasks.validation: Admin login uses proto-researcher everywhere and previous admin credentials no longer apply.

tasks.title: Harden guest navigation to Modbus-only view
tasks.description: Prevent guest users from accessing lab/home/configurator navigation and restrict guest to Modbus view only.
tasks.validation: Guest access cannot open lab/home/configurator or editor routes; only Modbus Test Bench is reachable.

tasks.title: Document lab switcher usage and integration notes
tasks.description: Add comprehensive guidance for using platform/lab_switcher/index.html and the control server.
tasks.validation: README (or docs) contains clear steps for running the lab switcher and describing expected behavior.

tasks.title: Switchover performance and resource report
tasks.description: Measure lab switchover timing, startup from zero, and resource peaks. Provide optimization options and compose vs Kubernetes evaluation.
tasks.validation: docs/switchover_performance.md includes timings, CPU/RAM peaks, restart behavior, and optimization recommendations.

tasks.title: Create blog content folder and initial article
tasks.description: Add a blog content folder and seed it with the Industrial Protocols Overview article in markdown.
tasks.validation: docs/blog/01-industrial-protocols-overview.md exists and contains the provided article text.

tasks.title: Add OT version control blog article
tasks.description: Add the Version Control Comes to the Plant Floor article to the blog content folder.
tasks.validation: docs/blog/02-version-control-plant-floor.md exists and contains the provided article text.

tasks.title: Replit integration roadmap and merge prompt
tasks.description: Produce a step-by-step roadmap to merge the Replit frontend project with this backend, plus a structured prompt for the Replit agent covering hardening, QC tests, multi-user scenarios, and recovery.
tasks.validation: docs/replit_integration_roadmap.md exists with roadmap, QA checklist, multi-user scenarios, recovery plan, and expansion-ready site structure.

tasks.title: Integrate Replit frontend into repo layout
tasks.description: Place the Replit frontend project into the repo under a canonical path (frontend/) and align README/docs to the new fullstack layout.
tasks.validation: frontend/ exists in repo with the Replit code and README reflects the unified layout.

tasks.title: Add frontend-backend realtime channel
tasks.description: Add a websocket (or SSE) channel so the frontend can receive lab status updates without polling.
tasks.validation: Frontend receives live lab status updates when switching protocols.

tasks.title: Update frontend integration prompt and next steps
tasks.description: Merge frontend prompt guidance into docs and PRD, including websocket usage and DevOps labs links to FUXA.
tasks.validation: docs/replit_integration_roadmap.md updated with websocket integration and next-step checklist.

tasks.title: Fix frontend lab switcher integration and UX
tasks.description: Align frontend environment variables with the lab switcher API, add a lab start action on protocol pages, and expose a live status stream for the UI.
tasks.validation: Frontend can start a lab via /api/lab/switch, shows live active protocol updates, and opens the correct guest/admin FUXA links.

tasks.title: Add frontend container + nginx reverse proxy for unified site
tasks.description: Containerize the frontend production build and add an nginx reverse proxy service that exposes the full site alongside guest/admin/diagnostics paths.
tasks.validation: docker compose brings up frontend + web proxy, site loads on a single port, and guest/admin/diag paths proxy correctly.
